title: Bug 114470 [Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: There are errors on the report page: There are error(s) in Table: table8Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)) detail: An error happened in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date.
EB: After saving and previewing, the table filter should work without any errors.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 
1. Create a new data source and a dataset containing a datetime column. 
2. Insert a table and add a filter based on the datetime column. 
3. In the value field of the filter, enter the value new Date('3/2/2005').
